--- published: true layout: post title: 'In API We Trust' image: http://kinlane-productions2.s3.amazonaws.com/api-evangelist-site/blog/KL_InApiWeTrust-1000.png ---

If you've met me in person, you know I always wear my logo on my t-shirt.  I'm not a graphic designer, and when I needed a logo for API Evangelist, I just wrapped the words in JSON and called it good.  It has stuck.  

When I was in France speaking at API Days, the art director at faberNovel drew some very cool sketches of me.  He recently followed up with some more high resolution images I can use for t-shirts.  

Very cool! Thank you so much Benoit Talabot and faberNovel!  I'm working on ordering some t-shirts using the work, right now on Inkd.
